website_summaries.verdict: Perfect glove pocket for first basemen in youth baseball, and it's offered at an excellent price.
pros: At 11.5" in length, this glove will work well for youth players as well as adults
Doesn't require a long break-in period as it is soft at the time it's shipped
Pocket uses a traditional design for a first baseman's mitt
Available in either a left- or right-handed fit
cons: Durability of this glove over the long run is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mitt for a young 1st baseman. Big, yet light. Fast break in.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a lot on my son's first ever 1st base mitt so I gambled on this. Truly a great mitt and could easily go for more money. It broke in fairly quickly and is a pretty big glove but light enough for a 9+ year old to handle. I have 20+ year old Rawlings, Wilson and Nokona mitts and I don't believe this will last that long as the leather broke in too quickly to be good quality leather but he should get a solid few years out of it. Highly recommend this for a young player.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa User

customer_reviews.title: This mitt is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Renegade series catchers mitt we have purchased. This is the first online. We bought this glove for our 13 yr old son. His first mitt lasted a little longer than 2 little league seasons and some tournaments. I'm not quite sure it is 80/20 broken in. Still needs to be worked in but definitely less than others. This also means that this mitt has worn down faster than an A2000. The leather isn't as high a quality. This mitt is good for the price, though. If he decides to remain a catcher into high school we will invest in a better quality mitt but for now it's doing what we need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G

customer_reviews.title: Good option for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I would give it 5 stars, but in comparison to the Allstar mit in the same price range, the Rawlings comes just slightly below. Call it 4.5 Stars. It’s not a “professional grade” leather, but IMO youth league kids won’t see the benifits of a high quality leather. They will out grow the glove before it breaks down. Break-in time was quick due to the softer leather, and the low price tag made it easy to give it a shot. Very happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Well make
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy! Can' t wait to break it in even more. It was a good purchase. I'm more excited than my son, who I bought it for. First, it is soft to touch and semi broken in as promised. The look of the glove is beautiful and it feels well made. I am very happy with it. Had to make a positive review of it. You wont be disappointed. Also, good price. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find - left handed 1st baseman's mitt for 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Recommend both the glove and the seller. Prompt delivery, Price is competitive. As a bonus it arrived almost broken in. Imported, quality undetermined until the glove is used this summer, but Rawlings is a excellent brand, no reason to suspect quality. Hard to find - few companies make a left handed 1st baseman's mitt for a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality on a budget
customer_reviews.text: My husband coaches baseball and his first baseman was needing a new glove. They chose this Rawlings Renegade Series. It is not the absolute best out there on the market but it a great quality glove that fit within the boys price range. They had the glove broke in fast. Season has been underway a few months now and the coach and player are satisfied with this gloves performance.
customer_reviews.author: PossumQueen

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my high school son. He just transitioned to catcher so this was our first purchase ever of a catchers glove. But he was adamit it had to be a Rawlings. The glove broke in very easily and he was able to use it right away. It made it through the season and looks like it will make it through more.
customer_reviews.author: cgh_slw

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. I am replacing strings halfway through the season but I expect that out of an $80 glove.
customer_reviews.author: R.W.B

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and easy to break in after several catches
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo son loves it! Size 11.5 fits him well. Really nice and easy to break in after several catches. Prior to using it, recommend that you tighten the laces/tie on both upper end of the gloves. For the price and quality - definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: Glove was broken in fairly well and was fine other than the fact that it was smaller than expected for this size (32.5 inches). Our catcher could barely get his hand inside--we had to stretch the opening.
customer_reviews.author: CoolDude

customer_reviews.title: fits great, a bit of room for him to grow ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 11 year old, was worried it was going to run small since he is a big kid. fits great, a bit of room for him to grow into. he loves it, super soft and lots of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: KELLI ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this for two years. Great quality. My daughter also used it for softball.
customer_reviews.author: KOONS

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove no compliants i have had it for awhile now and it is holding up well and I enjoy it. I use to coach my sons and team on pitching and it has served its purpose easliy.
customer_reviews.author: Billy E.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Ended up returning because we did not need it any longer but the glove quality was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice mitt!
customer_reviews.text: Great for any 8-12 yr old catcher. Breaks in easily
customer_reviews.author: Frederick G. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for youth baseball
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this glove. Great glove for youth baseball. You get the high quality glove you are looking for with the affordability you want for kid.
customer_reviews.author: jason rannebarger

customer_reviews.title: My son is on a 9U team and absolutely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is on a 9U team and absolutely loves the glove. Took sometime to break in but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glove and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove for my 9 year old. Took a season to really break in, but is now an awesome glove that he should have throughout his little league years and even beyond.
customer_reviews.author: PMA

customer_reviews.title: Great value- Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Good glove at a great price. This model is pretty much ready to go from a break in perspective. Give it a decent work out for 2-4 weeks and it’s 100% game ready...no big break in period. They hold up well as we’ve had two of these (different sizes). No reason to buy a high end expensive 1b glove for 11-14 year olds!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C Recka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke in quickly & easily for youth baseball / 9U
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: but the biggest I could fine for my left hand softball player
customer_reviews.text: smaller than expected, but the biggest I could fine for my left hand softball player.
customer_reviews.author: Fay Moten

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Grandson. Bought the left handed version, they're tough to find. Great quality glove.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Z.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glove
customer_reviews.text: Part of the web broke due to the lace breaking. Glove was used part time for 2 months and then after a 2 month break, it broke after a couple of days. Just got the point of being broken in. After observing further, I can see other laces breaking soon. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schwager

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. The size seemed just a bit small but it works for our 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: hurdashl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great mitt, my son loves it. very easy to break in and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Roy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove at a great price...
customer_reviews.text: Great product recommend to all in need for a lefty first base glove for their son. Ready to used right out of the box, only thing I used was a little bit of glove oil as it was mostly broken in. No complaints from my son as he loves his new glove and it works like a charm....
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift and the recipient liked it very much!
customer_reviews.author: bargainshopper

customer_reviews.title: Use the glove you have to work it to get it to break in
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great glove. My grandson has only used it for two games so still go some break in to go. But he loves the it.
customer_reviews.author: stephen smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glove and both kids love their gloves
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the price fool you....I bought a glove for each of my kids because they both HAD to use it when we only had one of them. Excellent glove and both kids love their gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good For Beginners getting to know the Game
customer_reviews.text: Good Glove. Well Constructed. Good For Recreational Play and Serious games. More of a Beginners Glove though.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Ivan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves the glove. Super fast shipping and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Perfect glove, took to Dicks sporting goods and had steamed. Able to use right away. Glove was great for 10 year old son. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Antonini

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Bought this for my daughter playing 16u and she loves it. Was able to use it in games almost right away.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7 year old well with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Travel Ball Approved
customer_reviews.text: This glove is perfect for my Travel Ball Player- perfect size for 8yr old player who plays multiple positions on 3 different teams/leagues. High Quality leather! Great craftsmanship! Many players on his team have purchased this glove after trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McEnroe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Not too stiff which was easy to break in
customer_reviews.author: Jata1908

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered the day after I had ordered it!!! Amazing glove and amazing service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Yaroch

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and broken in good for youth catchers
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for my daughter for fastpitch and is well broken in. Great mitt for young catchers.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the delivery time and quality of the glove. It fit my Mustang catcher perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Corey J.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for a young first baseman!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for a young first baseman! I was surprised at how nice this glove is given the lower price range. My son just turned 8 and is on the smaller size, so it is a little big, but he will grow into it. The glove was a little stiff out of the box, but after a week of practice it's game ready. Based on the quality of this glove I can see it lasting a couple of seasons. I definitely recommend this glove! The pictures I posted are prior to the glove being broken in.
customer_reviews.author: SS1981

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son bought this glove. He's slightly undersized for his age. The glove fits great. It came a little stiff but that's to be expected. He's used it for one season and it should serve him well for at least another year.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable mitt for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 32.5" catcher's mitt for my son -- he's in fifth grade, he's pretty undersized but prefers larger gloves so it works for him. If he weren't used to big gloves, though, this would be too large. Overall, it seems to be a serviceable mitt for the price, with substantial padding and reasonably comfortable. I've also tried it myself (I'd say I have relatively typical male adult hands -- 5'10", and my hands aren't disproportionately large or small), and while I can get my hand in it and catch with it in a pinch, it's pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: samgardner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value. Great glove.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter. Her position obviously is first on the little league majors. I was extremely impressed by this glove. And so was she. She absolutely loves it. Basically broken in already. Just needed a little work. She would rather use this than her limited edition $2xx Cat Ostermann glove. Wish I would've known that before I bought both. Hah. For the money this glove is an amazing value
customer_reviews.author: NickyW588

customer_reviews.title: Quality glove
customer_reviews.text: Great quality glove. Son likes it a lot. Took a little while to get it broken in how he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love this glove!
customer_reviews.text: The best glove I have ever owned! Took minimal time to break in and be game ready.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Villa

customer_reviews.title: Nice First Base Glove for Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12yr old son and it works great. He had never used one and loved it. I purchased the 11.5" and it fits him with room to grow (average height/weight). He will get at least another year out of it unless he goes through a big growth spurt. I put on some leather conditioner and it didn't take a lot to break in. He used it in a game within a week of receiving it. Nice mitt for price.
customer_reviews.author: kboy

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. My son loves it and he has made some great plays for our team.
customer_reviews.author: Joe  Keller

customer_reviews.title: What a steal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove for the cost. Half price from sports retail store. The shipping was right on time. My son is very happy with this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Glove is perfect for 9-10 year old soft leather and has upped ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son. Glove is perfect for 9-10 year old soft leather and has upped his game. Great glove, great value. Would highly recommend, and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great starter catchers mitt
customer_reviews.text: Great starter mitt for young players! Super easy to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove, amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this glove for my son who has played first base since he was 4 (he's now 10). Figured it was time to get him a first base glove, and I was not disappointed with this one. For the price, it's a great buy. Has a soft leather she'll, and he was able to use it almost immediately with little break required. Highly recommended if you need a solid glove at a cost effective price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glove!
customer_reviews.text: Glove came in like a charm! Exactly as I saw it in the store.

customer_reviews.title: Ready out of the box, perfect after a few days of breaking in.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for my 11yo, came almost game ready took a few short days to break in. Good quality materials.

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good glove at a very good price

customer_reviews.title: Great glove my 11 year old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great glove my 11 year old son loves it,I actually tried it out and I love it myself. Give it a shoot u have nothing to loose.

customer_reviews.title: The leather was soft an did not take long to break in
customer_reviews.text: My 10year old grandson loved the glove,he used it as soon as I gave it to him

customer_reviews.title: very happy. you have very little choices for young left ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy. you have very little choices for young left handers. this glove fits small hands of kids that are young. the glove comes 80% softened and just needs a little attention. what is nice about this style is the kid can look through the web and keep his eyes on the ball vs. a fielders glove solid web. I also used small amounts of shaving gel(the orange cap) to soften the leather even more and then tied a ball inside the glove overnight. very very happy with the glove
customer_reviews.author: kindle fire owner

customer_reviews.title: My 13 yr old loves it..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he absolutely loves it! Fits great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great budget 1B glove
customer_reviews.text: Great budget 1B glove. Took almost no time to break in and is holding up so far. We play adult men's hardball. Would recommend for sure
customer_reviews.author: SteRhythm

customer_reviews.title: He is an awesome first base player (and pitcher) and this will be ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson. According to his mom, he put it on and it was "perfect". My daughter had clued me in on the one he wanted and so grandma's gift was a hit!!! He spent part of Christmas day with his folks outside using this glove. He is an awesome first base player (and pitcher) and this will be great for his next season!!!
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for baseball but hand size little bit small

customer_reviews.title: this should have a better quality control
customer_reviews.text: The internal fingers separation ropes and partitions was torn after first use . very pity , this should have a better quality control.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mitt for First Base!
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes it, he said that it is not like his old mitt which he used to feel the hit of the ball in his hand and at the end of the game was hurting, so far this seems to be perfect. My only concern is the biggest size and his big hand is a little out, kind of small?!?

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break in
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old likes it. Easy to break in.

customer_reviews.text: Mitt broke in quick and works great. Perfect for my average size 8 year olds.

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level 1st basemans glove
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Breaks in quickly. Used the 11.5in for my 7 year old.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great glove
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this glove for the money is amazing...It even has a lot more padding in the palm than I expected. Compared to some other gloves, we feel this was the best buy for the money even over some that were more expensive at Dick's.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful glove..my daughter can't wait to use it at her next game..im very happy with the product..

customer_reviews.title: I love this Glove
customer_reviews.text: I love this Glove! I received the glove in time for my game! It felt really good on my hand!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for its price. Difficult to breakin into desired shape.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for an 8/9 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I got this glove for my 8-9 year old nephew who played first base. His old one was too small and not padded. I think it worked better and definitely more padded than his other one. We broke it in for a week, which is the only con. We used glove oil as well. But this glove lasted the entire season and now he's in the all star team and plays catcher/outfield WITH THE SAME GLOVE. So far, it has held up nicely. Probably for another two seasons or so!
customer_reviews.author: yesi v.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice first base mitt for younger players,no break in required. Grandson loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grandson was very happy with this mitt and got to play first baseman in summer league

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Price was good for the quality received, but for a 12.5" the sizing was way off. Too tight and an uncomforable for an adult with an average size hand.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: I think this glove is good but it took me one week to fully break it in. I would recommend this glove I play in all stars and travel also house and this glove was always good

customer_reviews.title: Great starter glove for the young 1st baseman
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for the price. Well broken in so it wouldn't be long for the 10 year old to use it easily. He loves it and can't wait for spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brockhoff

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!! Balls really stick
customer_reviews.text: My son is seven, and the youngest player on his dp team. He actually uses this as a catchers mitt. He is now the best catcher on his team! The balls really stick in this mitt.

customer_reviews.title: Great mitt
customer_reviews.text: the boys loved this mitt so much and bragged about it...that someone stole it!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for son playing club ball, great price, durable, not bad breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: High quality glove but very stiff on arrival
customer_reviews.text: We got this glove for our 9 year old daughter, who plays first base on a travel softball team. We haven't used it in a game yet since our fall season has ended but we're looking forward to trying it out in a game. The glove is definitely good quality. It feels as though it will hold up well under the rigors of travel softball. The only reason it lost a star is that it is not remotely broken in. It comes very, very stiff. Fortunately we have the whole winter to break it in, and by spring it should be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a little league baseball player - 11 years old.
customer_reviews.author: ExpressoMommyof5

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 year old and it should last two or three seasons. Well made glove.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only got it a few weeks ago but I can tell it's a quality mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is everything as described, and more! My son loves this glove, great quality! what else is there to say about Rawlings.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great glove! Purchased for my 8 yr old that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great glove! Purchased for my 8 yr old that plays travel ball. It was manageable brand new. We’re still working it but he’s been playing with it since day 1. I’d definitely save some money from the more expensive gloves and go with this one again. It’s just as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Strings broke in the gloves webbing
customer_reviews.text: Strings broke 1st and 2nd time my son used the glove at practice. The Web strings appear to be very brittle and weak in his glove. I'll have to have it re-strung with better leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for a young first baseman
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly for my seven year old. Almost ready to use right out of the box. A little oil and and 30 minutes of working it in and it was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: 10 minutes in and already relacing
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather and fits my 7 yo son's hand well. However the laces broke in the pocket within the first 10 minutes of breaking in and playing catch. Easy to fix but cheap laces.
customer_reviews.author: JHays

customer_reviews.title: Great Mitt and Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mitt for a 13 year old first baseman. He loves it. The mitt is well built for the price. The materials feel solid and it was easy to break-in.
customer_reviews.author: Lugbolt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Very soft and ready too start using out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great first base mitt, big and breaks in easy. Great for 8-12 ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made like they use to be....  :(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after 1 weeks baseball camp and after only 4 games the lace on the glove split.....my son is a lefty and 1st base so these gloves are hard to get easily....We were overseas for a tournament so could have been a short tournament for him.....luckily we were able to make a quick fix so he could continue to play.....gloves should definitely last longer than that so I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use right out of the box! Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase. I’m also glad that it isn’t the large 1st baseman glove that the pro-ball players use because I can use this lighter glove on all positions.
customer_reviews.author: steven wolfe

product_meta.title: Rawlings R115FBB-3/0 Renegade Glove Series
product_meta.description: Created specifically for 14U youth baseball leagues, Rawlings Raised Seam Baseballs are expertly constructed with cushioned cork centers with 15 percent wool windings and full-grain leather covers. When compared to flat seams, raised seams help improve your grip on the ball when pitching and fielding. These classic baseballs are the #1 choice of leagues, coaches, parents, and players in North America, helping young athletes play like the pros. These tournament-grade Little League baseballs are also available in competition-grade with a composite cork and rubber center.
feature_bullets: 11-1/2-inch first baseman's mitt great for recreational games
All-leather shell construction for pocket formation and shape retention
Deep, well-formed pocket for ball security
Single-post, double-bar web with conventional back designed for 1st basemen
